title: Fallout 3 - Galaxy News Radio Soundtrack [MP3]

                              Note From Delial
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This was actually created for my own personal use. I found myself singing the
GNR songs from Fallout 3 to myself over and over, so I extracted them from the
BSA's. The tags are all based on the credits at the end of the game. The only
songs in this pack are the individual songs credited there. They are in the
same order as they appear there. Everything else was ambient music, so I chose
to leave it out. If you want all the music by Inon Zur, some of it is already
extracted for you. All you need is Fallout 3. Otherwise you can use the
Oblivion Mod Manager to open "Fallout - Sound.bsa" and extract anything under
"soundssongs*". These songs were under "soundssongsradiolicensed*".
If the artist is "Original Soundtrack", that means that the artist was not
stated by Bethesda and that is was given to them by APM Music, Inc.
Enjoy!
